author: ggregory
msg: [LOG4J2-312] XML layout improvements (compact vs. pretty, namespace, namespace prefix, root element). Namespace is now "http://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.0/events" instead of "http://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.0" to allow for "http://logging.apache.org/log4j/2.0/conf" and possibly others. Right now, the config XML has NO namespace.

author: hiranya
msg: Applying the patch to SYNAPSE-890. Added a test case to verify the fix.

author: djencks
msg: FELIX-4171 don't try to close DependencyManagers we didn't open

author: larsh
msg: HBASE-8968  Avoid call to zk in HRegionServer#getMaster() to log the master address which already read from the zk. (rajeshbabu)

author: elecharny
msg: o Added a dedicated logger in RM to logs the RM checks
o Added a check() method which control the file after each update
o Called the check() method after each update
o Fixed the readPageIOs() method so that we don't read extra pages when the last offset is -1

o Changed the way we are managing free pages : there are now added before the first free page, instead of adding them at the end of the list of free pages. This makes the lastFreePage pretty useless now... (still to be removed)
